casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Melvin Frank SHERMAN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 31, 2018

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 127 Conn.App. 377, 13 A.3d 1138 (2011), is denied on the merits.

ROBINSON, C.J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
